entry.content: Impressed with v1 of Jekyll Admin, a GUI for writing/editing posts locally. https://github.com/jekyll/jekyll-admin Looking forward to expansion of API

entry.content: I think the question should be less why do pull quotes exist, but why are sites lazy in their implementation. There are already solutions to only show the quote once, both with just HTML/CSS and javascript. I’m sure other solutions could be found.
entry.summary: I think the question should be less why do pull quotes exist, but why are sites lazy in their implementation. There are already solutions to only show the quote once, both with just HTML/CSS and javascript. I’m sure other solutions could be found.
